retrieveDescription: retrieves macros and their related macroinstructions from an org and writes to a file
filename: (optional) name of the macro retrieve output file
retrievetargetdir: (required) directory root for the retrieved files
targetMacros: (required) list of macros to be retrieved.
errorNoMacrosReturned: No macros matching the given names were found in the target org.
errorWritingJson: There was an error writing the results of the retrieval command to '%s'.
